answers.author: Municipal Meerkat
answers.text:
With all the activity in my community, we rely on "emotionally intelligent signs" to make sure that important safety signs are noticed and obeyed.  Daniel Pink shares a great example of an emotionally intelligent sign that relates to pedestrian safety.
http://www.danpink.com/archives/2008/11/emotionally-intelligent-signage-in-action
